TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit StringInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供將字串分隔為文字項目並逐一查看那些文字項目的功能。

span.span: Provides functionality to split a string into text elements and to iterate through those text elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 定義的文字項目當做一個單位顯示為單一字元，也就是字母的文字。The .NET Framework defines a text element as a unit of text that is displayed as a single character, that is, a grapheme. 文字項目可以是基底字元、 surrogate 字組或組合字元序列。A text element can be a base character, a surrogate pair, or a combining character sequence. [Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定義為包含兩個字碼單位，其中配對的第一個單位是否為高 surrogate，而第二個是較小的順序是單一抽象字元編碼的字元表示的 surrogate 字組surrogate。The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a surrogate pair as a coded character representation for a single abstract character that consists of a sequence of two code units, where the first unit of the pair is a high surrogate and the second is a low surrogate. Unicode 標準會定義結合字元序列，做為基底字元和一個或多個組合字元的組合。The Unicode Standard defines a combining character sequence as a combination of a base character and one or more combining characters. 基底字元或組合字元，可代表 surrogate 字組。A surrogate pair can represent a base character or a combining character. 類別可讓您能夠以字串為一系列的文字項目，而不是個別物件。The class enables you to work with a string as a series of textual elements rather than individual objects. 具現化物件，表示指定的字串中，您可以執行下列其中一項：To instantiate a object that represents a specified string, you can do either of the following: - 呼叫建構函式並將它傳遞為字串，物件所要做為引數表示。Call the constructor and pass it the string that the object is to represent as an argument. - 呼叫預設建構函式，並將字串指派，物件是代表要傳遞到屬性。Call the default constructor, and assign the string that the object is to represent to the property. 您可以使用兩種方式的字串中的個別文字項目：You can work with the individual text elements in a string in two ways: - 列舉每個文字項目。By enumerating each text element. 若要這樣做，請呼叫方法，然後重複呼叫方法在傳回物件，直到該方法會傳回`false`。To do this, you call the method, and then repeatedly call the method on the returned object until the method returns `false`. - 藉由呼叫方法來擷取陣列，其中包含每個文字項目的起始的索引。By calling the method to retrieve an array that contains the starting index of each text element. 接著您可以藉由傳遞至這些索引擷取個別文字項目方法。You can then retrieve individual text elements by passing these indexes to the method. 下列範例說明這兩種使用字串中的文字項目。The following example illustrates both ways of working with the text elements in a string. 它會建立兩個字串：It creates two strings: - `strCombining`這是阿拉伯文字元的字串，包含三個文字項目與多個物件。`strCombining`, which is a string of Arabic characters that includes three text elements with multiple objects. 第一個文字項目，則基底字元阿拉伯文字母引 (U +-627) 後面接著阿拉伯文 HAMZA 下方 (U +-655) 和阿拉伯文 KASRA (U + 0650)。The first text element is the base character ARABIC LETTER ALEF (U+-627) followed by ARABIC HAMZA BELOW (U+-655) and ARABIC KASRA (U+0650). 第二個文字項目，則阿拉伯字母嘿嘿 (U + 0647) 後面接著阿拉伯文 FATHA (U +-64E)。The second text element is ARABIC LETTER HEH (U+0647) followed by ARABIC FATHA (U+-64E). 第三個文字項目，則阿拉伯 LETTTER 背後 (U + 0628) 後面接著阿拉伯文 DAMMATAN (U + 064 C)。The third text element is ARABIC LETTTER BEH (U+0628) followed by ARABIC DAMMATAN (U+064C). - `strSurrogates`這是包含三個 surrogate 字組的字串： 希臘 ACROPHONIC 五個才能 (U + 10148) 從補充多語文字面 U + 20026 補充表意平面，與 U + F1001 從私用使用者區域。`strSurrogates`, which is a string that includes three surrogate pairs: GREEK ACROPHONIC FIVE TALENTS (U+10148) from the Supplementary Multilingual Plane, U+20026 from the Supplementary Ideographic Plane, and U+F1001 from the private user area. 每個字元的 utf-16 編碼方式為 surrogate 字組所組成的高 surrogate，後面接著為低 surrogate。The UTF-16 encoding of each character is a surrogate pair that consists of a high surrogate followed by a low surrogate. 每個字串由一次剖析方法再依據方法。Each string is parsed once by the method and then by the method. 這兩種方法正確剖析的兩個字串中的文字項目，並顯示在剖析作業的結果。Both methods correctly parse the text elements in the two strings and display the results of the parsing operation. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.StringInfo.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.stringinfo.class/cs/indexing1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.StringInfo.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.stringinfo.class/vb/indexing1.vb#1)] ## Examples 這個範例示範如何使用和方法類別來操作包含 surrogate 字及組合字元的字串。This example shows how to use the and methods of the class to manipulate a string that contains surrogate and combining characters. [!code-cpp[stringinfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StringInfo/cpp/StringInfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[stringinfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StringInfo/CS/StringInfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[stringinfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StringInfo/vb/stringinfo.vb#1)]

para.span: 就內部而言，方法的類別呼叫的方法類別以決定字元類別。

span.span: Internally, the methods of the class call the methods of the class to determine character categories.

para.span: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)]，字元分類根據[Unicode Standard、 版本 8.0.0](https://unicode.org/versions/Unicode8.0.0)。

span.span: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)], character classification is based on [The Unicode Standard, Version 8.0.0](https://unicode.org/versions/Unicode8.0.0).

para.span: 如[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]透過[!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)]，則會根據[Unicode Standard、 版本 6.3.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode6.3.0/)。

span.span: For the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] through the [!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)], it is based on [The Unicode Standard, Version 6.3.0](https://www.unicode.org/versions/Unicode6.3.0/).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新的值物件會初始化為空字串 ("")。The value of the new object is initialized to the empty string (""). 您也可以使用它來指派另一個字串屬性。You can assign another string to it by using the property. 您也可以執行個體化物件，表示單一步驟中指定的字串，藉由呼叫建構函式。You can also instantiate a object that represents a specified string in a single step by calling the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行為相依於它的實作，可能會變更到另一個版本的 common language runtime。The behavior of is dependent on its implementation, which might change from one version of the common language runtime to another. 這可能會發生以改善效能的。This might happen to improve the performance of . 若要使的行為常數，應用程式應該覆寫的執行階段實作已知永遠不會變更的實作。To make the behavior of constant, the application should override the runtime implementation of with an implementation known to never change.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 定義的文字項目當做一個單位顯示為單一字元，也就是字母的文字。The .NET Framework defines a text element as a unit of text that is displayed as a single character, that is, a grapheme. 文字項目可以是基底字元、 surrogate 字組或組合字元序列。A text element can be a base character, a surrogate pair, or a combining character sequence. [Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定義為包含兩個字碼單位，其中配對的第一個單位是否為高 surrogate，而第二個是較小的順序是單一抽象字元編碼的字元表示的 surrogate 字組surrogate。The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a surrogate pair as a coded character representation for a single abstract character that consists of a sequence of two code units, where the first unit of the pair is a high surrogate and the second is a low surrogate. [Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定義結合字元序列，做為基底字元和一個或多個組合字元的組合。The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a combining character sequence as a combination of a base character and one or more combining characters. 基底字元或組合字元，可代表 surrogate 字組。A surrogate pair can represent a base character or a combining character. 這個方法只會傳回第一個文字項目。This method only returns the first text element. 若要逐一查看字串的文字項目，應用程式應該使用物件所產生方法。To iterate through the text elements of the string, the application should use the object generated by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 定義的文字項目當做一個單位顯示為單一字元，也就是字母的文字。The .NET Framework defines a text element as a unit of text that is displayed as a single character, that is, a grapheme. 文字項目可以是基底字元、 surrogate 字組或組合字元序列。A text element can be a base character, a surrogate pair, or a combining character sequence. [Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定義為包含兩個字碼單位，其中配對的第一個單位是否為高 surrogate，而第二個是較小的順序是單一抽象字元編碼的字元表示的 surrogate 字組surrogate。The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a surrogate pair as a coded character representation for a single abstract character that consists of a sequence of two code units, where the first unit of the pair is a high surrogate and the second is a low surrogate. Unicode 標準會定義結合字元序列，做為基底字元和一個或多個組合字元的組合。The Unicode Standard defines a combining character sequence as a combination of a base character and one or more combining characters. 基底字元或組合字元，可代表 surrogate 字組。A surrogate pair can represent a base character or a combining character. 這個方法只會傳回指定索引處開始的子字串的第一個文字項目。This method only returns the first text element of the substring that starts at the specified index. 若要逐一查看字串的文字項目，應用程式應該使用所產生方法。To iterate through the text elements of the string, the application should use the generated by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 定義的文字項目當做一個單位顯示為單一字元，也就是字母的文字。The .NET Framework defines a text element as a unit of text that is displayed as a single character, that is, a grapheme. 文字項目可以是基底字元、 surrogate 字組或組合字元序列。A text element can be a base character, a surrogate pair, or a combining character sequence. [Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定義為包含兩個字碼單位，其中配對的第一個單位是否為高 surrogate，而第二個是較小的順序是單一抽象字元編碼的字元表示的 surrogate 字組surrogate。The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a surrogate pair as a coded character representation for a single abstract character that consists of a sequence of two code units, where the first unit of the pair is a high surrogate and the second is a low surrogate. Unicode 標準會定義結合字元序列，做為基底字元和一個或多個組合字元的組合。The Unicode Standard defines a combining character sequence as a combination of a base character and one or more combining characters. 基底字元或組合字元，可代表 surrogate 字組。A surrogate pair can represent a base character or a combining character. 文字項目列舉值是只能用來讀取字串; 中的資料它不能修改基礎字串。The text element enumerator is used only to read data in the string; it cannot modify the underlying string. 列舉值並沒有獨佔存取權的字串。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the string. 列舉程式會處於無效狀態，如果它位於第一個文字項目之前在字串或字串中的最後一個文字項目之後。The enumerator is in an invalid state if it is positioned before the first text element in the string or after the last text element in the string. 處於無效狀態的列舉值時，呼叫擲回例外狀況。When the enumerator is in an invalid state, calling throws an exception. 一開始，列舉程式位在字串中的第一個文字項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first text element in the string. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 因此，建立列舉值之後或在之後呼叫時，列舉值前移至字串的第一個文字項目之前讀取的值必須呼叫。Therefore, after an enumerator is created or after is called, must be called to advance the enumerator to the first text element of the string before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 字串的末端後，列舉程式會一次無效的狀態和呼叫傳回`false`。After the end of the string is passed, the enumerator is again in an invalid state and calling returns `false`. 呼叫擲回例外狀況，如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`。Calling throws an exception if the last call to returned `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範呼叫方法。The following code example demonstrates calling the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[stringinfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StringInfo/cpp/StringInfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[stringinfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StringInfo/CS/StringInfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[stringinfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StringInfo/vb/stringinfo.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 定義的文字項目當做一個單位顯示為單一字元，也就是字母的文字。The .NET Framework defines a text element as a unit of text that is displayed as a single character, that is, a grapheme. 文字項目可以是基底字元、 surrogate 字組或組合字元序列。A text element can be a base character, a surrogate pair, or a combining character sequence. [Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定義為包含兩個字碼單位，其中配對的第一個單位是否為高 surrogate，而第二個是較小的順序是單一抽象字元編碼的字元表示的 surrogate 字組surrogate。The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a surrogate pair as a coded character representation for a single abstract character that consists of a sequence of two code units, where the first unit of the pair is a high surrogate and the second is a low surrogate. Unicode 標準會定義結合字元序列，做為基底字元和一個或多個組合字元的組合。The Unicode Standard defines a combining character sequence as a combination of a base character and one or more combining characters. 基底字元或組合字元，可代表 surrogate 字組。A surrogate pair can represent a base character or a combining character. 文字項目列舉值是只能用來讀取字串; 中的資料它不能修改基礎字串。The text element enumerator is used only to read data in the string; it cannot modify the underlying string. 列舉值並沒有獨佔存取權的字串。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the string. 列舉程式會處於無效狀態，如果它位於第一個文字項目之前在字串或字串中的最後一個文字項目之後。The enumerator is in an invalid state if it is positioned before the first text element in the string or after the last text element in the string. 處於無效狀態的列舉值時，呼叫擲回例外狀況。When the enumerator is in an invalid state, calling throws an exception. 一開始，列舉程式位在字串中的第一個文字項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first text element in the string. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 因此，建立列舉值之後或在之後呼叫時，列舉值前移至字串的第一個文字項目之前讀取的值必須呼叫。Therefore, after an enumerator is created or after is called, must be called to advance the enumerator to the first text element of the string before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 字串的末端後，列舉程式會一次無效的狀態和呼叫傳回`false`。After the end of the string is passed, the enumerator is again in an invalid state and calling returns `false`. 呼叫擲回例外狀況，如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`。Calling throws an exception if the last call to returned `false`.

summary.span: 傳回所指定字串內各個基底字元、高 Surrogate 或控制字元的索引。

span.span: Returns the indexes of each base character, high surrogate, or control character within the specified string.

returns.span: 整數陣列，包含所指定字串內各個基底字元、高 Surrogate 或控制字元的以零起始的索引。

span.span: An array of integers that contains the zero-based indexes of each base character, high surrogate, or control character within the specified string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定義為包含兩個字碼單位，其中配對的第一個單位是否為高 surrogate，而第二個是較小的順序是單一抽象字元編碼的字元表示的 surrogate 字組surrogate。The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a surrogate pair as a coded character representation for a single abstract character that consists of a sequence of two code units, where the first unit of the pair is a high surrogate and the second is a low surrogate. 高 surrogate 是 Unicode 字碼指標 U + D800 到 U + DBFF 範圍內，且為低 surrogate Unicode 字碼指標 U + DC00 到 U + DFFF 範圍中。A high surrogate is a Unicode code point in the range U+D800 through U+DBFF and a low surrogate is a Unicode code point in the range U+DC00 through U+DFFF. 控制字元是字元的 Unicode 值是 U + 007F 或 U + 0000 到 U + 001f 範圍或 U + 0080 到 U + 009F 範圍內。A control character is a character for which the Unicode value is U+007F or in the range U+0000 through U+001F or U+0080 through U+009F. .NET Framework 定義的文字項目當做一個單位顯示為單一字元，也就是字母的文字。The .NET Framework defines a text element as a unit of text that is displayed as a single character, that is, a grapheme. 文字項目可以是基底字元、 surrogate 字組或組合字元序列。A text element can be a base character, a surrogate pair, or a combining character sequence. [Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)定義結合字元序列，做為基底字元和一個或多個組合字元的組合。The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) defines a combining character sequence as a combination of a base character and one or more combining characters. 基底字元或組合字元，可代表 surrogate 字組。A surrogate pair can represent a base character or a combining character. 如果組合無效的字元序列，該序列中的每個組合字元，也會傳回。If a combining character sequence is invalid, every combining character in that sequence is also returned. 得到的陣列中每個索引都會開頭的文字項目，也就是基底字元或高 surrogate 的索引。Each index in the resulting array is the beginning of a text element, that is, the index of the base character or the high surrogate. 每個項目的長度是輕鬆地計算後續索引之間的差異。The length of each element is easily computed as the difference between successive indexes. 陣列的長度一定會小於或等於字串的長度。The length of the array will always be less than or equal to the length of the string. 例如，假設字串"\u4f00\u302a\ud800\udc00\u4f01"，這個方法會傳回索引 0、 2 和 4。For example, given the string "\u4f00\u302a\ud800\udc00\u4f01", this method returns the indexes 0, 2, and 4. ## 對等成員Equivalent Members 在.NET framework 2.0 版開始方法和屬性提供易於使用的實作所提供的功能方法。Starting in version 2.0 of the .NET Framework, the method and property provide an easy to use implementation of the functionality offered by the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範呼叫方法。The following code example demonstrates calling the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[stringinfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StringInfo/cpp/StringInfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[stringinfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StringInfo/CS/StringInfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[stringinfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StringInfo/vb/stringinfo.vb#1)]

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: public string String { get; set; }
.property instance string String
Public Property String As String
public: property System::String ^ String { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定目前 物件的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the current object.

value.span: 做為目前 物件值的字串。

span.span: The string that is the value of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當物件具現化，其屬性設定為下列值之一：When a object is instantiated, its property is set to one of the following values: - 如果預設呼叫。 if the default is called. 然後，您應該使用屬性，以將字串指派這個rperesents 的物件。You should then use the property to assign the string that this object rperesents. - 當做字串提供`value`引數建構函式。The string supplied as the `value` argument to the constructor.

span.span: The value in a set operation is .

summary.span: 從目前的 物件擷取文字項目的子字串。

span.span: Retrieves a substring of text elements from the current object.

MemberSignature.Value: public string SubstringByTextElements (int startingTextElement);
.method public hidebysig instance string SubstringByTextElements(int32 startingTextElement) cil managed
Public Function SubstringByTextElements (startingTextElement As Integer) As String
public: System::String ^ SubstringByTextElements(int startingTextElement);

param.name: startingTextElement
param.span: 物件中文字項目之以零為起始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of a text element in this object.

summary.span: 在目前的 物件中擷取文字項目的子字串，範圍從指定的文字項目開始，一直持續到最後一個文字項目。

span.span: Retrieves a substring of text elements from the current object starting from a specified text element and continuing through the last text element.

returns.span: 這個 物件中的文字項目的子字串，範圍從 參數指定的文字項目索引開始，一直持續到這個物件中的最後一個文字項目。

span.span: A substring of text elements in this object, starting from the text element index specified by the parameter and continuing through the last text element in this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請考慮包含五個文字項目，從 0 到 4 編製索引的字串。Consider a string that consists of five text elements, indexed from 0 through 4. 如果`startingTextElement`參數設為 1，方法傳回的子字串，則索引是 1、 2、 3 和 4 的文字項目所組成。If the `startingTextElement` parameter is 1, the method returns a substring that consists of the text elements for which the indexes are 1, 2, 3, and 4.

span.span: is less than zero.
-or-

exception.span: 做為目前 物件值的字串是空字串 ("")。

span.span: The string that is the value of the current object is the empty string ("").

MemberSignature.Value: public string SubstringByTextElements (int startingTextElement, int lengthInTextElements);
.method public hidebysig instance string SubstringByTextElements(int32 startingTextElement, int32 lengthInTextElements) cil managed
Public Function SubstringByTextElements (startingTextElement As Integer, lengthInTextElements As Integer) As String
public: System::String ^ SubstringByTextElements(int startingTextElement, int lengthInTextElements);

param.name: startingTextElement
param.span: 物件中文字項目之以零為起始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of a text element in this object.

param.name: lengthInTextElements
param.span: 要擷取的文字項目數目。

span.span: The number of text elements to retrieve.

summary.span: 在目前 物件中擷取文字項目的子字串，範圍從指定的文字項目開始，一直持續到指定的文字項目數目。

span.span: Retrieves a substring of text elements from the current object starting from a specified text element and continuing through the specified number of text elements.

returns.span: 這個 物件中的文字項目的子字串。

span.span: A substring of text elements in this object.

returns.span: 子字串由 參數所指定的文字項目數目所組成，而且從 參數所指定的文字項目索引開始。

span.span: The substring consists of the number of text elements specified by the parameter and starts from the text element index specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請考慮包含五個文字項目，從 0 到 4 編製索引的字串。Consider a string that consists of five text elements, indexed from 0 through 4. 如果`startingTextElement`參數是 1 和`lengthInTextElements`參數為 3，方法傳回的子字串，則索引是 1、 2 和 3 的文字項目所組成。If the `startingTextElement` parameter is 1 and the `lengthInTextElements` parameter is 3, the method returns a substring that consists of the text elements for which the indexes are 1, 2, and 3.

span.span: is less than zero.
-or-

exception.span: 大於或等於字串的長度，這個字串就是目前 物件的值。

span.span: is greater than or equal to the length of the string that is the value of the current object.
-or-
is less than zero.
-or-

exception.span: 做為目前 物件值的字串是空字串 ("")。

span.span: The string that is the value of the current object is the empty string ("").
-or-

exception.span: + 指定一個索引，其大於這個 物件中的文字項目數目。

span.span: + specify an index that is greater than the number of text elements in this object.
